main.name: Jessenia Kahn
main.bio: I'm a technologist with 10 years experience supporting innovative technology solutions for mission-driven companies. I have experience working in the areas of Application Development, Operations, Infrastructure, and Project Management as an individual contributor and technical lead. Some time ago I really fell in love working on developing secure applications with Operation excellency in mind. It's no surprise that I eventually landed somewhere in the intersection of these disciplines. I'm an avid team player with experience working in globally distributed remote teams, I find great satisfaction in helping and learning from others and facilitating cross team communications. I am a continuous learner and problem solver.
main.contactmessage: Have an inquiry or business opportunity? Get in touch and I'll get back to you as soon as I can!

quotes.text: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedoms—to choose one’s attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one’s own way.
quotes.user: Viktor E. Frankl, Man's Search for Meaning

quotes.text: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
